mainText:
Promo: "Bank of Entitlement: Where your every whim becomes our command. Sign up now for exclusive VIP treatment!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, I'm chilling on my yacht, basking in the glory of my impeccable tan when my personal assistant informs me that my favorite sushi place has a two-hour wait. A two-hour wait! Can you believe the audacity? Naturally, I demand she call the manager and demand they clear the entire restaurant for my arrival. And you know what? They do it! That's when I knew, I am truly deserving of this level of respect and service. Thank you, Bank of Entitlement, for always making me feel like the king I am!
